acp.beans

Class OperationReply

  • java.lang.Object
    • acp.beans.OperationReply

  • public class OperationReply
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represent operation/method invoking result to be sent back to the network clients (eg. Mozilla Firefox Plugin, Microsoft Add-in) when an operation request is made. The result type is set to Object so that any method return type can be stored into it. The status indicate the type of reply: REPLY or ERROR_REPLY.
    Author:
    Loke Yan Hao

    • Field Detail

      • REPLY

        public static final int REPLY
        The following are a list of available type of reply. REPLY: Normal reply. ERROR_REPLY: Error when processing the request. The result argument contains the error message.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • OperationReply

        public OperationReply(int status,
              java.lang.Object result)
        Basic constructor to create an instance of OperationReply object.
        Parameters:
        status - the type of reply to send. (REPLY or ERROR_REPLY).
        result - the return result after invoking a method.

    • Method Detail

      • getStatus

        public int getStatus()
        Return the status of the operation reply.

        The status can be either one of the value: REPLY (0) or ERROR_REPLY (1). When the status is on ERROR_REPLY (1), the result variable of this object will contain the error message to describe the error encounter when invoking a method.

        Returns:
        the type of the operation reply.

      • setStatus

        public void setStatus(int status)
        Set the the status of the operation reply.

        Use the constant variable in this class to set it to the appropriate types: REPLY or ERROR_REPLY.

        Parameters:
        status - the type of the operation reply.

      • getResult

        public java.lang.Object getResult()
        Return the result to be sent to the client.
        Returns:
        the return result after invoking a method.

      • setResult

        public void setResult(java.lang.Object result)
        Set the return result to be sent to the client after invoking a method.
        Parameters:
        result - the return result after invoking a method.

      • setErrorReply

        public void setErrorReply(java.lang.String message)
        Set the operation reply to return an error reply with an error message.
        Parameters:
        message - the error message.
